    • Method Detail

      • batchSize

        public GloVe.Builder<T> batchSize(int batchSize)
        This parameter specifies batch size for each thread. Also, if shuffle == TRUE, this batch will be shuffled before processing. Default value: 1000;
        Parameters:
        batchSize -
        Returns:

      • learningRate

      • maxMemory

        public GloVe.Builder<T> maxMemory(int gbytes)
        This method allows you to specify maximum memory available for CoOccurrence map builder. Please note: this option can be considered a debugging method. In most cases setting proper -Xmx argument set to JVM is enough to limit this algorithm. Please note: this option won't override -Xmx JVM value.
        Parameters:
        gbytes - memory limit, in gigabytes
        Returns:

      • xMax

        Returns:
